slides.title: Never Lose a Lead Again

content.headline: Connect Your CRM in One Click
content.subhead: Every inquiry automatically synced. Zero manual entry.
content.visual: CRM logos connected with sync arrows

slides.narration: How many leads have you lost because they came in through one system and never made it to another? Connect your CRM in one click, and every inquiry automatically syncs. Zero manual entry. Zero lost leads.

slides.title: We Connect With

content.headline: Integrations Ready to Go
content.note: Don't see yours? We probably support it.

slides.narration: We connect with the CRMs you actually use. Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, Pipedrive, Monday, Airtable, Google Sheets—and custom API if you have your own system. Don't see yours? We probably support it. Check the full list when you connect.

slides.title: What Gets Synced

content.headline: Automatic Sync, Both Ways
content.benefit: Your CRM becomes the single source of truth

slides.narration: Here's what gets synced automatically. New inquiries flow from Fibonacco to your CRM instantly. Contact updates sync both ways—change it here, it changes there. Lead status stays synchronized. Conversation history and activity timeline flow into your CRM automatically. Your CRM becomes the single source of truth.

slides.title: Why Connect
slides.narration: Stop copying and pasting. Manual data entry becomes automatic sync. Lost leads become every inquiry captured. Duplicate records become smart deduplication. Outdated info becomes real-time updates. Scattered conversations become everything in one place. One connection solves all of it.

slides.title: Setup Takes 2 Minutes
slides.narration: Setup takes two minutes. Step one: select your CRM from the list—thirty seconds. Step two: authorize the connection by logging into your CRM—one minute. Step three: map your fields or just use our smart defaults—thirty seconds. Then syncing starts immediately.

slides.title: Connect Your CRM
slides.narration: Ready to stop losing leads? Click 'Connect Your CRM' and you'll be syncing in two minutes. Free, simple setup, and you can disconnect anytime. Every lead captured. Every conversation tracked. Never lose another one.
